name: Sunday Night Stroll
description:
One night, Irene is out on a stroll through the town. When she spots a shiny red orb in a nearby shop window, she just HAS to get it. However, a little bit of a blood spill activates a weird force in the orb and sends her falling into a set of caves - and the only way is down...

Made in 8 days for the GBJAM 7.
